items.stem: According to the passage, it is believed that modern robots look like
The phrase "a killing spree" in paragraph (A) is closest meaning to
Why does the writer mention "fictional depictions" in paragraph (B)?
options: to emphasize the importance of robots
to compare with the definition of "robot"

items.stem: The word "roboticists" in paragraph (B) refers to
options: a specialist in robots or robotics

items.stem: Which of the following is NOT true according to the passage?
options: Robots are totally believed by humans
People are afraid that robots can steal their jobs
People worked less effectively than robots

items.stem: The word "supplant" in paragraph (C) is closest in meaning to
What does the word "their" in paragraph (D) refer to?
The word "inevitable" in paragraph (D) can be replaced by
What does the word "them" in paragraph (C) refer to?
In which paragraph does the writer give a definition?
